instruction: Outline the reasons why reading is important.
output: Reading is an important skill because it helps improve language literacy, develops critical thinking skills, increases vocabulary, sparks creativity, and boosts empathy. Furthermore, reading encourages independent thought, improves concentration and memory, makes it easier to write and understand literature, and allows us to explore distant lands and cultures without leaving the comfort of our homes. Simply put, reading is essential for personal growth, education, and exploration.
